title: SKT Kalista's Oathsworn Target Indicator
body: I really like the new SKT skins, especially the Kalista one, but there is something missing: the W passive indicatif for the basic attacks is the same as the base model and I feel like it doesn't really fit to the skin, and maybe a "SKT" logo or something around instead of the half spear(?) of the base model would fit better? It's like the SKT Alistar kept the wooden shield for his ult instead of the actualités SKT logos, it's kinda unfair for the poor Kalista... As it's not a 750 RP skin, I think it can be possible to have this little change before the live release.

replies.body:
Hey nyamou - 

Thanks for the feedback! This should be resolved, and the overhead particle now matches the thematic of the skin. ^-^ We decided to keep it a bit less distracting than the logo itself, and made the overhead mark yellow with a bit of blue, to match the rest of the particles on the skin.
